text: Sorry but what are those exactly? Idk scramble. That's a new term for me.
Well im never doing H, good luck!
I was trying to go clean to find a gay ass job.
Thats like a $300 shot in my area.

except it won't. I have a chronic nerve condition that causes constant uncontrollable pain. There is no known cure. I'm on opiods, anticonvulsants, antidepressants, and I take the same nausea med as cancer patients (about 4 times a day too). I've been working on getting it under control for close to a year now and I still make almost weekly or bi-weekly visits to the ER. Considering things can only get worse, and they could be much, much worse. I'm gonna leave while I still have my life under my control. edit: Wow, I just took my own post about happiness and made it depressing. sorry
Every time I combined the two, the MDMA either overwhelmed the H, or just quickly killed my nods. Either way...I prefer "down" to "up", so I don't mix them. Acid, on the other hand...

Interesting about the lyrica dxm interactions, I'll see if gaba does similar things. Crazy about the seizures and such, hope gaba doesn't do that..I will take it easy smoking while on it I guess, don't even have bud right now anyway though. But yea more than a bar ofmm Xanax at once and i could black out 4 mg Im blacked out but Ive taken 4 maybe twice and don't take them at all regularly. Kpins tho I can take like 15mg and barely feel it. No need to apologize, I absolutely welcome what you said and I appreciate you took the time to write this out for my benefit. Glad someone cares.

And I didn't say what part about it would be fun. I meant being in a cop car and having the privilege of not stopping for lights, being able to go as fast as you want, etc., would be fun. If I thought a bunch of piggies getting hard ons from their power trips was "fun", well, I'd be on the other side of this community.
Teeners? 15s maybe? That's my best guess haha. Sounds great other than then work shift.
opiates replaced all relationships in my life... its probably the hardest part of getting sober, that ur alone without the false comfort of opiates :( stay strong man, u can change it

Don't do them after tonight.. get high one time and don't fuck with opiates EVER again this is how most of us started too... now most of us regret getting into it. Ya it feels amazing at first but that doesn't last long before u need it to survive and start doing all kinds of shady shit.. I've seen good people ruin their lives with this shit bro.. please read this sub for a few hours to get perspective on what it can do to your life.. sry for rant. Tl;dr. Just don't even fuck with it kid. Stuck to weed and beer. Especially if your talking about weed tolerance breaks lol
